English: The child is going to school.
The child is staying at home.
The child eats rice at home.
The child is eating at home.
The child goes to sleep at home.
The child is sleeping at home.
Mom is at home with the child.
The child likes staying at home.
The child is playing at home.
The child is not at home.
The child is not going to school.
Has the child gone to sleep yet?
Has the child eaten rice yet?
The child wants to eat rice.
The child wants to go to sleep.
The child wants to stay home.

Vietnamese: Con ăn ở nhà hay ngoài.
English: The child eats at home or outside.

Vietnamese: Con đang chơi hay đang ngủ.
English: The child is playing or sleeping.
The child is at home with mom.
The child isn’t eating rice anymore.
